text: yate tomaloke iyara pithita sthira hai bahiba paraa, tara pichata tomalokara pratipalakara anugraha smarana karaiba yetiya tomaloke iyara oparata sthira hai bahiba, arau kaba, â€˜paraitra arau mahana te'om, yijane e'iboraka amara basibhuta karai diche. Athaca e'iboraka basibhuta karaibalai ami samartha nachilo
